title: A full page of magic resist per level runes gives 75 magic resist at level 18.
body:
Meanwhile a full page of attack damage per level runes grants 52

So the best ad item in the game aside from sword of the occult grants 80 ad.

The best magic resist item in the game grants 55.

With ad itemization a single ad item can provide more ad than a full rune page can. Ditto for every other statistic, just look at the runes and compare to the items in league, except magic resist. Magic resist itemization is so trashy that no single item can provide as much magic resist as a rune page.
